mapper.select:
select Count(1) FROM SBK_TB
INNER JOIN JOB_TB ON SBK_TB.SBK_YM = JOB_TB.SBK_YM AND SBK_TB.SBK_SEQ = JOB_TB.SBK_SEQ AND SBK_TB.REVISION = JOB_TB.SBK_REVISION AND JOB_TB.STATE != 'D'
LEFT JOIN TEST_ITEM_TB ON JOB_TB.QUO_YM = TEST_ITEM_TB.QUO_YM AND JOB_TB.QUO_SEQ = TEST_ITEM_TB.QUO_SEQ AND TEST_ITEM_TB.STATE != 'D'
LEFT JOIN TEST_TB ON TEST_TB.TEST_ITEM_SEQ = TEST_ITEM_TB.TEST_ITEM_SEQ
LEFT JOIN RAW_TB ON TEST_TB.TEST_SEQ = RAW_TB.TEST_SEQ
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SBK_ID, IM_YM, IM_SEQ, SUM(qty) inCnt, SUM(IF(CARRY_OUT_CODE IS NOT NULL, qty, 0)) outCnt FROM IM_TB
LEFT JOIN IM_SUB_TB ON IM_SUB_TB.im_id = FN_GET_SEQSTRING('IM', IM_TB.IM_YM, 'G', IM_TB.IM_SEQ) WHERE DIV_CODE = 1 AND IM_SUB_TB.STATE != 'D' GROUP BY SBK_ID ) IM_TB ON CONCAT ('SB', SBK_TB.SBK_YM, '-' , SBK_TB.TYPE, LPAD(SBK_TB.SBK_SEQ,4,0), IF(REVISION > 0, CONCAT ('-',REVISION), '')) = IM_TB.SBK_ID
LEFT JOIN IM_SUB_TB in_sub ON in_sub.IM_SUB_SEQ = (SELECT IM_SUB_SEQ FROM IM_SUB_TB sub WHERE FN_GET_SEQSTRING('IM', IM_YM, 'G', IM_SEQ) = sub.IM_ID ORDER BY sub.IM_SUB_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1) AND FN_GET_SEQSTRING('IM', IM_YM, 'G', IM_SEQ) = in_sub.IM_ID
LEFT JOIN IM_SUB_TB out_sub ON out_sub.IM_SUB_SEQ = (SELECT IM_SUB_SEQ FROM IM_SUB_TB sub WHERE FN_GET_SEQSTRING('IM', IM_YM, 'G', IM_SEQ) = sub.IM_ID AND CARRY_OUT_CODE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sub.IM_SUB_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1) AND FN_GET_SEQSTRING('IM', IM_YM, 'G', IM_SEQ) = out_sub.IM_ID
INNER JOIN (SELECT @rownum:=0) r
WHERE 1 = 1 # 재발행 신청서 제외 AND SBK_TB.REVISION = 0
AND DATE_FORMAT (out_sub.CARRY_OUT_DATE, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT (in_sub.CARRY_IN_DATE, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
AND IFNULL(JOB_TB.CMPY_NAME, '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND IFNULL(JOB_TB.PRDCT_NAME, '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND IFNULL(JOB_TB.MODEL_NAME, '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as no, lst.* FROM ( SELECT
FN_GET_SEQSTRING('SB', SBK_TB.SBK_YM, SBK_TB.TYPE, SBK_TB.SBK_SEQ) sbkId, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(IFNULL(CONCAT(SBK_TB.APP_YEAR, LPAD(SBK_TB.APP_MON, 2, 0), LPAD(SBK_TB.APP_DAY, 2, 0)), ''), '%Y%m%d'), '%Y-%m-%d') RCPT_DT, /* 현장시험일 경우에는 시료반입일에 현장시험 노출 */ IF (TEST_PLACE_OUT_YN=1,'현장시험',IFNULL (DATE_FORMAT (in_sub.CARRY_IN_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d'),'-')) CARRY_IN_DATE, FN_MEM_NAME (in_sub.CARRY_IN_ID) CARRY_IN_NAME, IFNULL (DATE_FORMAT (TEST_TB.INS_DT, '%Y-%m-%d'), '-') testDtStr, IFNULL (CONCAT (FN_GET_SEQSTRING('SB', JOB_TB.SBK_YM, 'G', JOB_TB.SBK_SEQ), '-', TEST_TB.TEST_TYPE_CODE, LPAD(TEST_TB.TEST_NO, 4, 0)), '') testId, IFNULL (JOB_TB.CMPY_NAME, '') cmpyName, JOB_TB.PRDCT_NAME, JOB_TB.MODEL_NAME, TEST_STNDR_TB.TEST_STNDR TEST_STNDR, IFNULL (IM_TB.inCnt, 0) inCnt, IFNULL (IM_TB.outCnt, 0) outCnt, IFNULL (DATE_FORMAT(out_sub.CARRY_OUT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d'), '-') CARRY_OUT_DATE, FN_MEM_NAME(out_sub.CARRY_OUT_ID) CARRY_OUT_NAME, IFNULL (FN_CODE_NAME(out_sub.CARRY_OUT_CODE, 'TC'), '') CARRY_OUT_TYPE, IFNULL (out_sub.CARRY_OUT_DLVRY_NAME, '') CARRY_OUT_DLVRY_NAME, IFNULL (out_sub.CARRY_OUT_DLVRY_INVC, '') CARRY_OUT_DLVRY_INVC, IFNULL (DATE_FORMAT(IF(TEST_ITEM_TB.TEST_STNDR_SEQ = 10, RAW_TB.REPORT_DT, TEST_TB.TEST_REPORT_DT), '%Y-%m-%d'), '-') REPORT_DT FROM SBK_TB
INNER JOIN JOB_TB ON SBK_TB.SBK_YM = JOB_TB.SBK_YM AND SBK_TB.SBK_SEQ = JOB_TB.SBK_SEQ AND SBK_TB.REVISION = JOB_TB.SBK_REVISION AND JOB_TB.STATE != 'D'
LEFT JOIN TEST_ITEM_TB ON JOB_TB.QUO_YM = TEST_ITEM_TB.QUO_YM AND JOB_TB.QUO_SEQ = TEST_ITEM_TB.QUO_SEQ AND TEST_ITEM_TB.STATE != 'D'
LEFT JOIN TEST_TB ON TEST_TB.TEST_ITEM_SEQ = TEST_ITEM_TB.TEST_ITEM_SEQ
LEFT JOIN RAW_TB ON TEST_TB.TEST_SEQ = RAW_TB.TEST_SEQ
LEFT JOIN TEST_STNDR_TB ON TEST_ITEM_TB.TEST_STNDR_SEQ = TEST_STNDR_TB.TEST_STNDR_SEQ
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SBK_ID, IM_YM, IM_SEQ, SUM(qty) inCnt, SUM(IF(CARRY_OUT_CODE IS NOT NULL, qty, 0)) outCnt FROM IM_TB
LEFT JOIN IM_SUB_TB ON IM_SUB_TB.im_id = FN_GET_SEQSTRING('IM', IM_TB.IM_YM, 'G', IM_TB.IM_SEQ) WHERE DIV_CODE = 1 AND IM_SUB_TB.STATE != 'D' GROUP BY SBK_ID ) IM_TB ON CONCAT ('SB', SBK_TB.SBK_YM, '-' , SBK_TB.TYPE, LPAD(SBK_TB.SBK_SEQ,4,0), IF(REVISION > 0, CONCAT ('-',REVISION), '')) = IM_TB.SBK_ID
LEFT JOIN IM_SUB_TB in_sub ON in_sub.IM_SUB_SEQ = (SELECT IM_SUB_SEQ FROM IM_SUB_TB sub WHERE FN_GET_SEQSTRING('IM', IM_YM, 'G', IM_SEQ) = sub.IM_ID ORDER BY sub.IM_SUB_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1) AND FN_GET_SEQSTRING('IM', IM_YM, 'G', IM_SEQ) = in_sub.IM_ID
LEFT JOIN IM_SUB_TB out_sub ON out_sub.IM_SUB_SEQ = (SELECT IM_SUB_SEQ FROM IM_SUB_TB sub WHERE FN_GET_SEQSTRING('IM', IM_YM, 'G', IM_SEQ) = sub.IM_ID AND CARRY_OUT_CODE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sub.IM_SUB_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1) AND FN_GET_SEQSTRING('IM', IM_YM, 'G', IM_SEQ) = out_sub.IM_ID
INNER JOIN (SELECT @rownum:=0) r
WHERE 1 = 1 # 재발행 신청서 제외 AND SBK_TB.REVISION = 0
AND DATE_FORMAT (out_sub.CARRY_OUT_DATE, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT (in_sub.CARRY_IN_DATE, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
AND IFNULL(JOB_TB.CMPY_NAME, '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND IFNULL(JOB_TB.PRDCT_NAME, '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND IFNULL(JOB_TB.MODEL_NAME, '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
order by SBK_TB.INS_DT asc ) lst
order by no asc LIMIT #{pageUnit} OFFSET #{firstIndex};
